if allactivities(plan)[0]['type'] != "train" and intercity_transport_origin(allactivities(plan)[0])==start_city(plan) and allactivities(plan)[-1]['type'] != "train" and intercity_transport_origin(allactivities(plan)[-1])==target_city(plan):
  result=True

result=True
for activity in allactivities(plan):
  if activity_type(activity) in ['attraction', 'airplane', 'train'] and activity_tickets(activity)!=1: result=False
  if innercity_transport_type(activity_transports(activity))=='metro'and metro_tickets(activity_transports(activity))!=1: result=False
nature_language:
我们1人，从深圳出发，到上海旅行2天，要求如下：
希望游览刘海粟美术馆 和 观光夜市(威尼斯水城之夜) 和 中山公园
不希望乘坐train前往目的地，不希望乘坐train返回
